price: Na'am! Wanda duk ya cika alkawarinsa, kuma ya yi taƙawa, to, lalle ne Allah yana son mãsu jin Tsoronsa.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
